short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send any image / GIF as a customizable e-card via Ellacard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Ellacard, you can already create e-cards with your own pictures, videos, and more. This extension makes it even easier to create your own Ellacard with any picture you see online.

Just hover over a picture you like, click the "Send as Ellacard" button, and the Ellacard editor will open with that picture pre-loaded as the cover of your card, all without leaving the site you're on.

Send unlimited cards for no extra charge with an Ellacard subscription. Click the "Open in Ellacard" button for our full customization options!
